name: Diane Luquiser
goal:
European Affairs, Communication strategy, programme/project management and business development:
- All sectors with specific high level expertise in Aerospace, Security, External relations, Diplomacy, Justice, Home Affairs, ICTS, Energy, Transport and Environment, including their R&I and International cooperation sides;
- Setting up, developing and implementing projects;
- Training for delegates in business and diplomatic etiquette and protocol;
- R&I funds, Structural funds, EFD;
- Intelligence gathering for customers;
- Organising key events;
- Organising meetings with key EU representatives;
- Supporting public and private entities to better position on the EU market.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Banking and financial services, Borders and Security, Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Foreign affairs and security policy, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Sport, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives:
- Space policy (ex.Copernicus, Galileo, Space situational awareness, space debris, space and security);
- Communication, culture, etiquette and protocol;
- Security/Homme affairs (ex. fight against terrorism, visa and immigration, Infrastructures protection, digital security, Frontex issues);
- Fundamental rights (ex. remembrance, anti islamophobia, anti semitism, gender issues).
customers: Minding Manners Academy of London Ltd,European Start Up Services
